message: I propose a fair division: 90 for me, 10 for you.  Let's get this over with quickly.
Your offer was unfair. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.
Let's be more reasonable this time. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a fairer compromise than your last offer.
We both lose if this goes on any longer.  I'm willing to accept slightly less than half, but I need you to meet me halfway. This is my final offer.
